name: 中英文字体收集 My Font Collection
description:
用来收集我设计生涯中遇到的心爱字体❤️


其中大部分为可免费商用，每个卡片标题可以跳转到字体官方地址。收费字体也不提供下载链接（因为懒），请善用搜索引擎，并尊重版权。欢迎 duplicate 后添加你自己喜爱的字体。


特别感谢草帽 @sMao 的中文常用字库，本文件在他的项目基础上修改而来。


有任何建议，欢迎来我的留言板留言 💬


This is a collection of my favorite fonts (Chinese and English), most of them are free for commercial use, which are indicated by green color. You can click the title of each box to navigate to the font's official page.


Feel free to duplicate and make your own collection!


Special thanks to @sMao.


And please come and leave me a message on my Message Board!


🖋️ Chagelog


2021/6/23

  • Added Chinese font "尔雅新大黑"
